metadata.title: Connect with Expert Women's Health Specialists | Eleva Care
metadata.description: Eleva Care: Find and book trusted women's health experts for pregnancy, postpartum, menopause, and sexual health. A trusted platform connecting you with independent care experts.

hero.title: World-Class Women's Health Experts, *on-demand.*
hero.subtitle: Book Leading Women's Health Specialists - On Your Schedule.
hero.disclaimer: We connect you with independent, licensed health experts.
hero.cta1: Not sure if we can help? Take the Quiz

services.title: How we support you
services.subtitle: Expert-led care, tailored to you
services.description: Access personalized care from top women‚Äôs health professionals. We connect you with the expertise you need‚Äîfrom online consultations to local resources‚Äîdesigned around your unique journey.

item0.title: Pregnancy & Postpartum
item0.description: Compassionate, evidence-based support through pregnancy and early motherhood.
item0.subitem0: **Physical Therapy:** Prepare for birth, manage pain, regain strength, address diastasis recti, and receive targeted pelvic floor interventions to prevent and treat dysfunction.
item0.subitem1: **OB/GYN Care:** Receive expert care throughout your pregnancy journey and postpartum recovery.
item0.subitem2: **Nutritional Guidance:** Optimize your diet for a healthy pregnancy and postpartum journey.
item0.subitem3: **Mental Health Support:** Navigate the emotional and mental challenges of motherhood with compassionate guidance.
item0.subitem4: **Exercise:** Explore the benefits of therapeutic exercise during pregnancy and postpartum, designed to support your changing body and promote a healthy recovery.

item1.title: Pelvic Health
item1.description: Specialized care for pelvic floor health across every stage of life.
item1.subitem0: **Pelvic Physical Therapy:** Specialized treatment for incontinence, pelvic organ prolapse, and pelvic pain, including pain during intercourse.
item1.subitem1: **Specialized OB/GYN Care:** Expert diagnosis and treatment for a range of pelvic health issues, including prolapse, endometriosis, and sexual dysfunction.
item1.subitem2: **Mental Health Support:** Counseling and therapy to address the psychological aspects of pelvic health concerns.

item2.title: Through Every Stage
item2.description: Holistic support from adolescence through menopause‚Äîand beyond.
item2.subitem0: **Teen Health:** Navigate puberty, menstruation, and early womanhood with confidence and support.
item2.subitem1: **Menopause Management:** Address hormonal changes, manage symptoms, and prioritize your well-being.
item2.subitem2: **Mental Wellness:** Access therapy and support to manage stress, anxiety, depression, and other mental health concerns.
item2.subitem3: **Fitness & Nutrition:** Discover personalized exercise plans and nutritional guidance tailored to your individual needs.
item2.subitem4: **Physical Therapy:** Manage pain, prevent injury, and optimize your physical performance, with specialized expertise in pelvic floor health for active women and female athletes.

item3.title: Empowering Your Cancer Journey
item3.description: Specialized support for breast and gynecologic cancers‚Äîfrom diagnosis to survivorship.
item3.subitem0: **Physical Therapy:** Optimize your recovery with pre-surgical preparation, post-treatment rehabilitation, lymphedema management, and targeted exercise programs designed for each phase of your cancer journey.
item3.subitem1: **Pain Management:** Access evidence-based techniques for managing treatment-related pain, including manual therapy, therapeutic exercise, and scar tissue management.
item3.subitem2: **Exercise Support:** Receive personalized exercise prescriptions that adapt to your treatment phase, helping maintain strength, manage fatigue, and support your recovery journey.
item3.subitem3: **Mental Health Care:** Navigate the emotional challenges of diagnosis and treatment with professional support focused on building resilience and managing anxiety.
item3.subitem4: **Lymphedema Care:** Benefit from specialized prevention strategies and treatment including manual lymphatic drainage, compression therapy, and self-management education.
item3.subitem5: **Collaborative Approach:** Our collaborative approach ensures coordinated care with your oncology team, supporting your physical and emotional well-being throughout treatment and recovery.

approach.title: At Eleva Care, we believe:
approach.item0: Every woman deserves access to **quality healthcare**.
approach.item3: Women's health is a lifelong, **evolving journey**.
approach.item4: **Pelvic health** is essential to overall well-being.
approach.description: At Eleva Care, we believe in a collaborative approach to care. Our team of experts work together to provide you with comprehensive and personalized support, ensuring that every aspect of your health is addressed.

cta.title: Join Our Network
cta.heading: Discover Your Personalized Care Journey Today
cta.description: Take our quick health assessment or schedule your consultation.

footer.tagline: Empowering women's health through expert care and innovation.

platformDisclaimer.title: We're a digital health platform
platformDisclaimer.description: Eleva.care enables the delivery of remote healthcare services (teleconsultations) by independent, licensed professionals. We provide the technology; your chosen expert provides your care.

experts.title: Independent Experts
experts.subtitle: Connect with Leading Specialists
experts.description: Find and book trusted experts specializing in physiotherapy and women's health. Our platform connects you with qualified care experts ready to support your unique health and wellness journey.
experts.topExpertDisclaimer: Experts on Eleva Care are independent professionals who self-certify their credentials and professional status. Eleva.care may request documentation and perform reasonable checks where required for platform integrity, regulatory compliance, or risk management.

modal.title: About the Eleva Care platform
modal.description: A friendly note on how Eleva Care works and what to do in an emergency.

emergency.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Not for medical emergencies
emergency.description: If you‚Äôre experiencing a medical emergency, please don‚Äôt use Eleva Care. Contact emergency services:

platform.title: How Eleva Care works
platform.description: Eleva Care is a digital health platform that enables the delivery of remote healthcare services by independent, licensed professionals. Eleva.care does not provide clinical care; your chosen expert provides your care.

weAreList.technology: Booking, scheduling, and payment processing tools
weAreList.secure: Encrypted storage for expert clinical notes

weAreNotList.responsible: Medical liability (your expert is responsible for your care)

platform.footer: Experts on Eleva Care are independent professionals who self-certify their credentials and professional status. Eleva.care may request documentation and perform reasonable checks where required for platform integrity, regulatory compliance, or risk management. Experts remain solely responsible for the clinical care they provide. For full details, please read our

cookie.title: Cookie Preferences
cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and for marketing purposes. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.
cookie.manageMessage: Manage your cookie preferences below. Essential cookies are always enabled as they are necessary for the website to function properly.
cookie.manageEssentialSubtitle: Required for the website to function properly
cookie.manageAnalyticsSubtitle: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
cookie.manageSocialSubtitle: Enable social media features and sharing
cookie.manageAdvertSubtitle: Personalize advertisements and measure their performance

checkout.multibancoNotice: ‚ö†Ô∏è **Multibanco Payment Notice:** If you choose Multibanco as your payment method, your appointment slot will be reserved for 24 hours while we wait for payment confirmation. After 24 hours, if payment is not received, we cannot guarantee the appointment will still be available. For immediate confirmation, please use a credit/debit card. [View Payment Policies]({paymentPoliciesUrl})
checkout.termsOfService: By proceeding with payment, you agree to our [Terms of Service]({termsUrl}) and [Payment Policies]({paymentPoliciesUrl}).

multibancoBookingPending.subject: Booking Confirmed - Payment Required via Multibanco

email.preview: Your booking is confirmed - Payment Required via Multibanco
email.title: Booking Confirmed - Payment Required
email.bookingConfirmedText: Your booking has been confirmed and your appointment slot is reserved.
email.paymentInstructions: To complete your booking, please pay using Multibanco with the details below:
email.method1: 1. Online Banking: Log into your bank account and select "Payments" or "Multibanco"
email.method2: 2. ATM: Insert your card, select "Other Operations" ‚Üí "Payments" ‚Üí "Public Services"
email.method3: 3. Enter the Entity and Reference numbers above, confirm the amount
email.meetingAccessText: Once your payment is confirmed, you will receive another email with your meeting link and access details.
email.importantText: Your appointment slot is reserved for 7 days. If payment is not received by the expiry date above, your reservation will be cancelled.
email.questionsText: If you have any questions about your booking or payment, please contact our support team.
email.thankYou: Thank you for choosing Eleva Care!

publishDialog.title: Publish Your Expert Profile
publishDialog.description: Publishing your profile will make it visible to clients searching for experts. Your profile, services, and availability will be public.
publishDialog.agreementText: I have read and agree to the
publishDialog.agreementIncludes: including professional conduct standards, liability terms, and platform obligations
publishDialog.disclaimer: By publishing your profile, you acknowledge that you are a licensed care expert and agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

unpublishDialog.title: Unpublish Your Expert Profile
unpublishDialog.description: Unpublishing your profile will hide it from clients. You will not appear in search results and clients won't be able to book your services until you publish again.

incompleteDialog.title: Complete All Steps First
incompleteDialog.description: Your profile cannot be published until all required steps are completed. Please complete the following steps:

billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Expert Payment Settings
billing.description: Connect your Stripe account to receive payments for your expert services. Eleva takes a 15% service fee, and the remaining 85% will be transferred directly to your account.
billing.legalDisclaimer: By connecting your payment account, you agree to our
billing.learnMore: Learn more about fees, refunds, and payout schedules in our Payment Policies.
